hero.title: HACKBOOT
hero.subtitle: Experience unparalleled gaming performance with our cutting-edge cloud technology. Professional-grade tools designed for serious gamers who demand the best.

gaming.title: Next Generation Gaming
gaming.subtitle: CLOUD GAMING REVOLUTION
gaming.description: Experience unparalleled gaming excellence with our cutting-edge cloud technology. Professional-grade gaming solutions designed for serious gamers who demand the best performance, zero latency, and instant access to AAA titles.

security.title: Advanced Security
security.subtitle: UNDETECTABLE TECHNOLOGY
security.description: State-of-the-art protection systems with multiple layers of security. Our cloud infrastructure ensures your gaming sessions are safe, private, and completely undetectable with 0% detection rate across all platforms.

cloud.title: Cloud Infrastructure
cloud.subtitle: ENTERPRISE PERFORMANCE
cloud.description: Powered by enterprise-grade cloud infrastructure ensuring 99.9% uptime and seamless scalability. Experience real-time responsiveness with minimal latency, automatic updates, and 24/7 dedicated support.

about.title: OUR STORY
about.subtitle: Discover the story and vision of Hackboot, Estonian leader in next-generation cloud gaming

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Hackboot is an innovative technology company specialized in high-performance cloud gaming solutions.
overview.vmcloudDesc: We are part of the VMCloud Group, a leader in enterprise cloud solutions and innovative technologies.
overview.establishedDesc: Founded in Estonia with a clear vision: revolutionize the gaming industry through the cloud.
overview.mission: We build premium gaming experiences with uncompromising security.
overview.vision: A trusted ecosystem for competitive players and creators.

stats.title: Our numbers speak
stats.subtitle: Metrics that demonstrate our commitment to excellence

timeline.title: Our journey
timeline.subtitle: From game keys to cloud gaming leader

event1.title: Hackboot Creation
event1.description: Launch of the company with game key sales. First customer base in the gaming market, establishing our reputation.

event2.title: Strategic Pivot
event2.description: Transition to custom software development in the gaming field. Deep technical expertise and continuous innovation.

event3.title: Cloud Gaming Revolution
event3.description: Launch of our cloud gaming platform with focus on professional tools. Immediate success and exponential growth.

event4.title: VMCloud Expansion
event4.description: Integration into VMCloud Group and expansion of generalized cloud services. New era of growth and innovation.

vision.title: Our direction
vision.heading: Become the Estonian cloud gaming leader
vision.description: We aspire to be globally recognized as the reference for professional cloud gaming solutions, offering the best possible services.
points: Expansion in markets where our activity is legal
Development of generalized cloud gaming solutions

mission.heading: Provide ultra-performant infrastructure
mission.description: Our mission is to provide ultra-performant, simple and transparent cloud gaming infrastructure, eliminating all technical complexity.

values.heading: The values that define us
values.description: Our core values guide every decision and action within Hackboot.
values.title: Our values

list.title: Excellence
list.description: We strive for excellence in everything we do

list.title: Innovation
list.description: Innovation is at the core of our DNA

list.title: Transparency
list.description: Open and honest communication with our clients

culture.title: Our company culture
culture.subtitle: A unique philosophy that fosters passion and excellence

philosophy.title: Work philosophy
philosophy.description: We recruit on talent and feeling. Passion for development comes first. Total freedom: work from where you want, when you want, as long as the work gets done.

principles.title: Remote First
principles.description: Work from anywhere in the world

principles.title: Total autonomy
principles.description: Make your decisions, we trust you

principles.title: Passion first
principles.description: Passion and motivation are our drivers

principles.title: Maximum efficiency
principles.description: No useless meetings, focus on results

items.title: Flexible hours
items.desc: Manage your time as you wish

legal.title: Legal framework & compliance
legal.subtitle: Operating under Estonian jurisdiction with full respect for applicable laws

jurisdiction.title: Estonian jurisdiction
jurisdiction.description: In Estonia, the development and use of game modifications are fully legal under current laws.
benefits: Legal framework favorable to technological innovation

market.title: Target markets
market.description: We focus exclusively on markets where our activity is legal and accepted.
market.warning: European expansion is currently impossible due to regulatory differences. We remain focused on the Estonian market and compatible jurisdictions.

points.title: Full compliance
points.description: Strict respect of all Estonian laws
points.details: We work with legal advisors to ensure continuous compliance.

points.title: Data protection
points.details: End-to-end encryption and secure storage of all data.

points.title: Licenses & certifications
points.details: Registered and licensed company in Estonia.

team.title: Our team
team.subtitle: Passionate talents from around the world

join.title: Join the Hackboot adventure
join.description: We are constantly looking for passionate talents to join our team. If you share our vision, contact us.

services.title: Infrastructure & pro-level security
services.subtitle: Tailored services for players and teams who demand perfection.

expertise.title: Mastered technical execution
expertise.description: We operate on optimized bare-metal infrastructure with real-time monitoring and a continuous deployment pipeline.

contact.title: Book a meeting
contact.description: Our teams get back to you within 24 hours to assess your needs and prepare a deployment plan.

premium.title: PREMIUM
premium.description: The ultimate gaming experience. Maximum performance, full catalog, flexible plans.
benefits: Three plans tailored to your needs

featuresHeading.title: PREMIUM BENEFITS
featuresHeading.subtitle: Discover what makes our Premium offer exceptional

performance.title: Exceptional Performance
performance.subtitle: Maximum power
performance.description: Virtual machines equipped with the latest technology deliver top-tier gaming performance. RTX 4090, next-gen processors, and DDR5 RAM keep every session smooth.

games.title: Complete Catalog
games.subtitle: Every game
games.description: Unlimited access to our entire game library. Valorant, Apex Legends, Overwatch, Fortnite, and more with no extra fees.

technology.title: Cutting-edge Tech
technology.subtitle: Constant innovation
technology.description: Cloud infrastructure updated continuously with the latest innovations. Architecture optimized for minimal latency and maximum performance.

instant.title: Install to Play
instant.subtitle: Ready instantly
instant.description: No downloads, no installs. Connect to your virtual machine and play immediately with pre-configured environments.

price.title: Flexible plans
price.subtitle: Three tailored tiers
price.description: Choose the plan that fits your playstyle and unlock every feature. No hidden fees, no surprises.

security.title: Maximum Security
security.subtitle: Total protection
security.description: Multi-layer undetectable protection with an integrated HWID spoofer. Kernel-level technology keeps every session safe.

cta.title: Ready to go Premium?
cta.description: Join the elite of gaming with unlimited access to every feature

premiumSignup.title: Activate your premium access
premiumSignup.description: Pick a plan, create your account, and start instantly on the most powerful infrastructure.

form.title: Complete your signup
form.description: You're one step away from joining the Hackboot community. Provide your details to generate your secure access.
form.terms: I accept the terms and conditions and the privacy policy.
form.disclaimer: By confirming your signup, an advisor will contact you to finalize access to your premium space.
